CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 4 These materials are electron deficient due to the substitution of an aromatic core with one or two sets of π-accepting imide groups that are mutually conjugated.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| aromatic core |
| π-accepting imide groups |

Explanation:

* "aromatic core" is identified as a Material Name because it refers to a specific type of material that is substituted in the paragraph.
* "π-accepting imide groups" is also identified as a Material Name because it refers to a specific type of material that is part of the substitution on the aromatic core.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| aromatic core |
| π-accepting imide groups |

Explanation:

* "aromatic core" is identified as a Material Name because it refers to a specific type of material that is substituted in the paragraph.
* "π-accepting imide groups" is also identified as a Material Name because it refers to a specific type of material that is part of the substitution on the aromatic core.
* "one or two sets" and "that are mutually conjugated" are not identified as Material Names because they are quantifiers and a property of the π-accepting imide groups, respectively, and do not refer to a specific type of material.
